title: Why Choose Us?
subtitle: Behind every strategy we create is a story of ambition, trust, and success. Here's what some of our valued clients have shared about their journey with Onza.

items.text: Prospect replaced three tools we were duct-taping together and does the job better. It's fast, elegant, and genuinely understands how we work. We spend less time managing systems and more time making real progress.
items.author: Cassandra H.

items.text: Onza provided unmatched wealth strategies that perfectly aligned with our family goals.
items.author: Michael T.

items.text: Their team truly understands long-term planning. Highly recommended.
items.author: Sophia K.
